summary: This is an email from U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman acknowledging updates regarding the Epstein investigation. The updates include that a judge signed a search warrant and that the FBI received a flight manifest from Customs and Border Protection listing Epstein and two pilots as passengers, with plans to confirm after takeoff.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of email updates regarding the Epstein investigation, acknowledges the information.

persons.name: Judge Moses
persons.context: Signed a search warrant related to the Epstein investigation on the morning of July 6, 2019.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on a flight manifest obtained by the FBI from Customs and Border Protection.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is involved in the legal proceedings and investigation concerning Epstein.
Judge Moses signed a search warrant related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Search Warrant Signed
events.description: Judge Moses signed a search warrant related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Flight Manifest Received
events.description: FBI received a flight manifest from Customs and Border Protection listing Epstein and two pilots as passengers, with plans to confirm after takeoff.

keyFacts: A search warrant related to the Epstein investigation was signed by Judge Moses on the morning of July 6, 2019.
The FBI received a flight manifest from Customs and Border Protection listing Epstein and two pilots as passengers.
The flight manifest information was subject to change, and the FBI planned to confirm the passengers after the flight took off.
The email communication indicates active investigative steps being taken by the U.S. Attorney's Office and FBI regarding Epstein in July 2019.
